text: Srečko Katanec (born 16 July 1963) is a former Slovenian football player. He played for Yugoslavia and Slovenia national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club performance Club performance Club performance League League National cup National cup League cup League cup Continental Continental Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals 1980–81 Olimpija Ljubljana First League 2 0 1981–82 17 0 1982–83 29 4 1983–84 33 6 1985–86 Dinamo Zagreb First League 21 3 1986–87 Partizan First League 30 3 1987–88 28 6 West Germany West Germany West Germany League League DFB-Pokal DFB-Pokal Other Other Continental Continental Total Total 1988–89 VfB Stuttgart Bundesliga 26 1 Italy Italy Italy League League Coppa Italia Coppa Italia League cup League cup Continental Continental Total Total 1989–90 Sampdoria Serie A 27 5 1990–91 26 2 1991–92 26 4 1992–93 4 0 1993–94 4 1 Career total Career total Career total 273 35 ===Managerial=== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Record Record Record Record Team From To Gorica 18 December 1997 2 July 1998 Slovenia 2 July 1998 18 June 2002 Olympiacos 2 November 2002 7 February 2003 Macedonia 17 February 2006 6 April 2009 United Arab Emirates 23 June 2009 6 September 2011 Slovenia 4 January 2013 24 December 2017 Iraq 4 September 2018 July 2021 Uzbekistan 27 August 2021 Present Total Total Total — ==Honours== Partizan * Yugoslav First League: 1986–87 VfB Stuttgart * UEFA Cup runner-up: 1988–89 Sampdoria * Serie A: 1990–91 * Coppa Italia: 1993–94 * Supercoppa Italiana: 1991 * Cup Winners' Cup: 1989–90 * European Cup runner-up: 1991–92 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian footballers Category:Slovenian football managers Category:Sportspeople from Ljubljana Category:Olympiacos F.C. managers Category:Yugoslavia at UEFA Euro 1984 Category:Yugoslavia at the 1990 FIFA World Cup Category:Slovenia at the 2002 FIFA World Cup
